archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0181
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be able to call satellite & premium numbers, so that I connect with the people they need

properties.value: OOTB Assumed for the Horizon 1 that Premium numbers will be blocked because of unknown call cost and satteline numbers will be handled in the same way as the calls to International numbers

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
